title: 24 Cat Memes For Cat Pawrents Debuting December Blanket Season With Wholesome Cat Comedy
description: Hello all you purrtrovert cat pawrents, did you officially open up this December's blanket season? We think that if you're here, you are probably an introvert with a cat, who's reading these very words from under a fluffy blanket - so here you are, a purrtrovert cat pawrent, officially opening the December blanket season. And what's a better official opening ceremony for such a festive event there is other than scrolling through a bunch of wholesome cat memes? Under the blanket, of course. With your cat cuddled with you, of course. For us, it sounds like the pawrfect purrlympics opening ceremony. To be honest, we're doing the same. As we write these words, we're under a comfy blanket, snuggled with our cute cat. That's purrfection.To complete this blanket season opening, scroll down for a dose of sweetness in the form of wholesome cat memes. It fits any purrtrovert in your blanket-y situation.
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: 24 Cat Memes For Cat Pawrents Debuting December Blanket Season With Wholesome Cat Comedy - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Hello all you purrtrovert cat pawrents, did you officially open up this December's blanket season? We think that if you're here, you are probably an introvert with a cat, who's reading these very words from under a fluffy blanket - so here you are, a purrtrovert cat pawrent, officially opening the December blanket season. And what's a better official opening ceremony for such a festive event there is other than scrolling through a bunch of wholesome cat memes? Under the blanket, of course. With your cat cuddled with you, of course. For us, it sounds like the pawrfect purrlympics opening ceremony. To be honest, we're doing the same. As we write these words, we're under a comfy blanket, snuggled with our cute cat. That's purrfection.

To complete this blanket season opening, scroll down for a dose of sweetness in the form of wholesome cat memes. It fits any purrtrovert in your blanket-y situation.
